channel.title: When i post a scipt in
channel.description:
Sometimes when a post a script into scar it dosent space it out and it all goes into one line.
Can someone help me out with my problem please.

item.title: When i post a scipt in
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

[quote=“yachibu, post:1, topic:12570”]Sometimes when a post a script into scar it dosent space it out and it all goes into one line.

Can someone help me out with my problem please.[/quote]
Quote this script like this ^^^^ and then when its in the quick reply box copy it from in there and then paste it in SCAR, and that should work.
~jR
